description: This file defines the Mem0Tools class, a toolkit for managing user memories via the mem0 API, including adding, searching, retrieving, and deleting memories. It handles external dependencies, initializes a client, and provides methods for memory operations.

classes.name: Mem0Tools
classes.description: A toolkit class for managing user memories with mem0 API, providing methods to add, search, retrieve, and delete memories.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the Mem0Tools instance, setting up the mem0 client based on API key, config, or default settings.

methods.name: _get_user_id
methods.description: Resolves the user ID from the method parameters or agent session state.

methods.name: add_memory
methods.description: Adds a memory entry for a user, accepting string or dictionary content.

methods.name: search_memory
methods.description: Performs a semantic search across stored memories for a given query.

methods.name: get_all_memories
methods.description: Retrieves all memories for the current user.

methods.name: delete_all_memories
methods.description: Deletes all memories associated with the current user.
